channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Block Storage for VPC (is.volume) has a new plan named gen2-volume-acadia
[updated] Block Storage for VPC (is.volume) has a new plan named gen2-volume-sdp
item.description:
With the sdp profile (latest generation), you can provision block storage volumes in VPC with capacity starting from 1 GB and up to 32,000 GB. This profile allows you to customize capacity, IOPS and throughput independently of each other based on your application needs, enabling you to scale volume performance independently of volume size.
Sdp volumes deliver a baseline IOPS performance of 3,000 IOPS and a baseline throughput performance of 125 MB/s, both of which (IOPS and throughput) are included with the price of storage. You can provision additional IOPS (up to 64,000) and throughput (up to 1,024 MB/s) at an additional price.
Pricing for the sdp profile is based on a combination of capacity plus IOPS and throughput performance. Price for capacity and performance is calculated using a linear model, the price will scale linearly depending on the volume size, IOPS and throughput you select.
